title.narrative: Youth at Risk as Resources for

description.narrative: Civic education is promoted for youth at risk to enable them to constructively participate in decision-making processes at all level and civic education and leadership training activities as well as SGBV awareness raising.

activity-description.narrative: Provide Civic education at youth risk to enhance meaningful decision making in Sierra Leone

sector.narrative: Eradicate poverty in all its forms and dimensions

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).
UNDP as the Implementing Partner will comply with the policies, procedures and practices of the United Nations Security Management System (UNSMS.)

description.narrative: Outcome Indicator 1a: % of youth at risk targeted by the project who believe that their voice is heard and they feel more respected in their communities. Outcome Indicator 1b: number of youth at risk targeted by the project included in decision-making mechanisms at local level. Output Indicator 1.1.1: % of youth at risk who believe that use of violence is never justified to resolve conflicts and achieve political objectives. Output Indicator 1.1.2: Number of youth at risk who undergo counselling and recover from substance abuse habits. Output Indicator 1.2.1: Number of youth at risk who become members of local youth groups and participate in DYC and CYC activities. Output Indicator 1.2.2: Dialogue forums discuss and address risk analysis with the participation of youth at risk. Output Indicator 1.2.3: % of youth at risk who believe that structural barriers to their reintegration are removed and feel safe to participate in communities’ mechanisms and activities

comment.narrative: 1a. Baseline - 55% total, 49% female, 58% male 1b. Baseline - 34% total, 17% female, 45% male 1.1.1 Baseline - 13% total, 10% female, 15% male 1.1.2 Baseline - 0 currently undergoing counselling; 39% of youth at risk have been sensitized on the risks of drug abuse 1.2.1 Baseline - 42% of youth at risk participate sometimes or often in DYC/CYC activities; 2 individuals are members of the actual DYC/CYC 1.2.2 Baseline - 0 1.2.3 Baseline - 59% total, 61% female, 58% male

1a Target: Estimate 70% (F: 60%; M:70%) 1b Target: Estimate 50% out of 100% of youth targeted by the project (F:35%; M:50%). 1.1.1 Target: Estimate 80% (F: 80%; M: 70%). 1.1.2 Target: Estimate 70% (F: 60%; M:50%). 1.2.1 Target: 70% 1.2.2:Target: 4 (1 per chiefdom). 1.2.3 Target: 80%

1a. Result - Perception survey to assess achievement of the Outcome will be done by end of project evaluation. 1b. Result - Perception survey to assess achievement of the Outcome will be done by end of project evaluation. 1.1.1 Result - Perception survey to assess achievement of the Output will be done by end of project evaluation. 1.1.2 Result - Perception survey to assess achievement of the Output will be done by end of project evaluation. 1.2.1 Result - 36 (20Male, 16Female) identified representatives from the respective youth at risk groups have been incorporated into District and Chiefdom Youth Councils. 1.2.2 Result - No dialogue session has been organised. 1.2.3 Result - No survey has not been done to determine progress made in the achievement of the Output
